body_html: This is expected behavior. On x2 = x * 2, TensorFlow inserted a Mul node into the current graph. On the subsequent ... = (x * 2) ..., TF inserted yet another new Mul node. In other words, tensor x4_issue does not depend on x2 in anyway.
body_text: This is expected behavior.  On x2 = x * 2, TensorFlow inserted a Mul node into the current graph.  On the subsequent ... = (x * 2) ..., TF inserted yet another new Mul node.  In other words, tensor x4_issue does not depend on x2 in anyway.
body: This is expected behavior.  On `x2 = x * 2`, TensorFlow inserted a `Mul` node into the current graph.  On the subsequent `... = (x * 2) ...`, TF inserted yet another new `Mul` node.  In other words, tensor `x4_issue` does not depend on `x2` in anyway.
